content.title: PETFusion 2.0 Package Deliveries Have Begun!
content.creator:
Creative3DP
February 6, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We are excited to announce that the delivery of all PETFusion 2.0 packages has commenced. You can expect to receive your package within the next 24 hours.
For our backers in the Commercial License tier, your Commercial License Agreement will be sent to you for e-signature within the next 24 to 48 hours.
If you don't receive your package within that timeframe, please contact us via Kickstarter messaging or email us at info@creative3dp.net.
 Thank you once again for your support!
Best regards,
Creative3DP Team

comments.text: Please check your kickstarter inbox we've have already sent the download link as well as on your mail.

We have already delivered the files via email as well as on Kickstarter. Please check your inbox, as I can see they were sent successfully. For your convenience, I have also resent the download link to your Kickstarter inbox. Kindly check and let me know if you have any trouble accessing it. Thanks!

You should have received the commercial license agreement via Adobe Acrobat. Please check your inbox, and if you haven‚Äôt signed it yet, kindly do so. Also, be sure to check your spam folder in case it was filtered there.
Hmm, no email with my stls or parts list here...

content.title: Thank You for Supporting PETFusion 2.0! üöÄ
content.creator:
Creative3DP
January 27, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
The PETFusion 2.0 campaign üöÄ is now officially complete, and we couldn‚Äôt have done it without you! Thank you for believing in this project and supporting our mission to make 3D printing more sustainable. Your enthusiasm and trust mean everything to us!
We know you‚Äôre eager to get started, and we want to keep you updated‚Äîwe‚Äôll begin delivering the files in about 2 weeks. Kickstarter takes around two weeks to finalize the backer report, so we kindly ask for your patience while we get everything organized.
If you have any questions, comments, or just want to share your excitement, feel free to send us a message on Kickstarter! We‚Äôre here to help and can‚Äôt wait to see what you create with PETFusion 2.0.
Thank you again for being part of this journey! Let‚Äôs turn waste into creativity together. ‚ôªÔ∏è‚ú®
Best,
Creative3DP Team

comments.text: I was planning to speed tracking with the thickness measurement sensor. Why won't you post the step files?
One of the things I'm most excited about is the welder aspect. I have SO many spools with "almost nothing" remaining...

Dear Priyank Pal, When you distribute the final files, could you include the STEP/STP type files too? I have the CL version, so I want to modify some parts and with STP files, it will be quite helpful. Thanks

STEP files won‚Äôt be included in the package, but after delivery, if you need modifications, just let me know which specific part you want to adjust, and We‚Äôll send you the STEP file for that. Happy to help make any changes you need!

Dear Priyank Pal Please inform me which printable parts from version 1 can I reuse in version 2? Please inform me which parts of the electronics used in version 1 can I reuse in version 2 of pet fusion? Please can you send me the files of the airdryer filament dryer in 3mf format cut in bambustudio for the bambulab A1 printer to my email: kerococoec@gmail.com. Thank you for your kind reply.

PETFusion 2.0 is completely new and different in every aspect from version 1, so no printable parts from the previous version can be reused. In terms of electronics, PETFusion 2.0 uses completely different components. However, you can reuse the power inlet, cutter blade, and volcano hotend (as the filament welder)‚Äîthe rest are entirely different. I'll send you the AeroDry files in 3MF format to your email shortly. Thank You

content.title: We Did It! 100% Funded!
content.creator:
Creative3DP
December 28, 2024
content.content:
In just 3 hours, PETFusion 2.0 has been fully funded! üöÄ This is absolutely incredible, and I can‚Äôt thank you all enough for your support. It‚Äôs amazing to see this level of enthusiasm for turning waste into creativity.
This is just the beginning‚Äîlet‚Äôs keep the momentum going and make an even bigger impact together! üíö
